amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to prevent restrictions to public access to fishing downstream of dams owned by the Corps of Engineers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 348 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 348 proposed by Senator Alexander.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 348 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 348 proposed by Senator Alexander.
